problem_text: In \odot P, the radius is 2 inches, find the length of \widehat R S. Round to the nearest hundredth.
compact_text: In \odot P, the radius is 2 inches, find the length of \widehat RS. Round to the nearest hundredth.
annotat_text: In $\odot P$, the radius is $2$ inches, find the length of $\widehat {RS}$. Round to the nearest hundredth.
